description: Try our easy to follow Choc Ripple Wreath Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Choc Ripple Wreath Cake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 pkt Arnott's choc ripple plain biscuits

recipeInstructions.text: When ready to serve, loosen springform tin and take off the side. Gently place your serving plate over the wreath and carefully turn upside down. Spread remaining cream over the wreath and top with fresh berries.
